posts.text:
Anybody knows when there is a nice off road / modify show in Iceland this year?
So that I can see a lot of the built and modified Trucks from Iceland! 
Thanks!!  yes will specially fly over to see that show!  little car crazy :)
Hi there is one now  11 of june wery close to Reykjavik , and then there is another 2 july  on east coast of Iceland ,Egilsstaðir
Thank you please let me know more about these shows !!
What can i tell you more ?  you just have to fly over and see it :)
its today...   and I didn't make it in time I could not leave that fast..   I hope there is another show or maybe somebody could post some photos from this show.
Look at jakop cecil magnússon on face book  or mine Helgi Helgason  there is a video  :)
Ferðaklúbburinn 4x4    has a truck show right?  is that every year?  will there still be a truck show in 2016 ?

I mean a show same like this:   
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=DtsEzvaPKUE
also where Arctic Trucks and Breytir and others  are..

These shows are not every year. The club ( Ferðaklúbburinn 4X4 ) had a small shows with 6-10 trucks on Reykjavík cultural night ( Menningarnótt ) last year and the year before  that, but I'm not sure if there will be anything this year.
